comments.body: Might be worth raising this issue upstream.
FWIW there seems to be a [build option]( https://github.com/MagicStack/asyncpg/blob/v0.12.0/setup.py#L33-L34 ) to build with Cython directly (even when the C files are present).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  # Not using pypi URL because the source dist has incorrect C files for windows
  url: https://github.com/MagicStack/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash_value }}
